insight: Boss has two separate health display systems: `Fighting.Health_Bar` in settings.yml is a global action bar (bottom of screen) for all bosses, while `Boss_Bar` in each boss's YAML is a per-boss Minecraft BossBar (top of screen) with Enabled, Color, Style, Title, and Radius keys. Boss_Bar is disabled by default and managed by `BossBossBarManager` using Foundation's Adventure BossBar API.
